Reviews.Title: terrible
Reviews.Author: kimberly
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my birthday I live in Trinidad n by the time it finally got to me the return policy was expired.the phone worked for 3 days n start to give trouble I try carrying it to fix but it cud not b fixed multiple places I was so disappointed plus the phone came without any headset port n the  ox it came in wasn't even a box from the blackberry company itself the box was plane n had a sticker write blackberry I bought it new brand n give trouble after 3 days,hope this review was helpful

Reviews.Title: waste
Reviews.Author: Eddison L. Sukansingh
Reviews.Content: This device is a fake.Cortes Inc is selling some working phones and others not working.This is the second non functional phone delivered to my country Trinidad and Tobago.I now got this phone and when placed to charge it just displays a red light and then nothing.I plea with amazon to investigate the products sold by this seller.I do not expect a perfect product as it is used but to have it working at least would be good which is not the case.It shocks me to know that these people are actually using Amazon to sell non-functional products.If there was a governing system to report "Cortes Inc" i would send them a report of this non-functional product.I plea with future buyers not to buy products sold by "Cortes Inc".Thank you for your poor serices and I hope someone from Amamzon investigates your organization "Cortes Inc", soon.

Reviews.Title: I really liked the phone!
Reviews.Author: cege095800
Reviews.Content: I ordered the phone because my blackberry curve was getting ready to bite the dust, and I decided to upgrade to touch screen.  One thing that threw me off was that unlike an iphone or a droid, you actually have to press the screen as if it were a button.  The phone also didn't come with a charger, but luckily I had one.  Other than that the phone works great! I definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a new phone!! :)

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: eric
Reviews.Content: Thanks, it was expected that the product works very well, everything is complete as they promised, thank you very much

Reviews.Title: NICE PHONE!
Reviews.Author: evobigtwin
Reviews.Content: WAS LOOKING FOR A REPLACEMENT FOR MY SAMSUNG DROID CHARGE, THAT WOULDN'T DIAL OUT ANYMORE AFTER ONLY LIKE 15 MONTHS OF USE!--INSTEAD OF A WARRANTY CLAIM I WENT BACK TO THE BLACKBERRY PHONE-- THIS PHONE IS GREAT FOR WHAT I NEEDED-- TALK,TEXT AND EMAILS-- IT WILL PULL UP A WEB PAGE BUT NOT AS FAST AS MY DROID CHARGE, BUT I HAVE A TABLET AND LAPTOP FOR THAT-- THE NEW PUSH BUTTON SCREEN IS AWESOME IF YOUR USED TO A SLIDE SCREEN SMART PHONE-- I AM HAPPY WITH MY BLACKBERRY FOR ABOUT THE SAME COST AS A WARRANTY REFURBISHED REPLACEMENT I GOT A BRAND NEW PHONE!--GREAT DEAL AND PHONE FOR ME--I AM HAPPY WITH MY NEW PHONE!

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Please, don't buy this phone! It's slow, battery doesn't hold charge for more than 2 hours, the screen comes loose, it's heavy and the response for the touch screen is just terrible!! I threw this thing away after a week, it's irritating. My advice: get any other phone, the Blackberry Storm is NOT worth it.

Reviews.Title: excellent care and very good quality
Reviews.Author: Yadiry Yamile Contreras Ramírez
Reviews.Content: excelente atencion y muy buena calidad, de producto muy buen servicio y puntualidad de entrega, buenos precios y buena explicacion del producto al momento de ver las publicaciones

Reviews.Title: buena compra
Reviews.Author: leonel ulichny
Reviews.Content: buena compra aunque me ofrecieron con memoria externa y no llego al igual el protector de pantalla, al igual estaba bloqueada solo para telefonía verizon

Reviews.Title: Blackberry storm
Reviews.Author: NaNee
Reviews.Content: Product arrived on time...however I sent it back as this phone sucks battery juice way too fast. Only held power for a couple hours and then needed recharging. Now I know why Blackberry came out with a newer model.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Tommy
Reviews.Content: Everything went very well from ordering to shipping and am very pleased with the phone i will forsure visit the site and order again.
